mcq.statement: Choose the correct Indirect speech: The Hyder said, "It gives me great pleasure to be here this morning"?

options.a: The Hyder exclaimed with joy that it gave him great pleasure to be there that morning
options.b: The Hyder said that it gave him great pleasure to be there that morning
options.c: The Hyder said it gave him great pleasure to be there that morning
options.d: The Hyder said that it gives him great pleasure to be there this morning
